thread.title: Laura Ingraham: ‘Concerning’ for Gorsuch to Be Criticizing Trump’s Tweets
thread.title_full: Laura Ingraham: ‘Concerning’ for Gorsuch to Be Criticizing Trump’s Tweets

author: Josh Feldman
title: Laura Ingraham: ‘Concerning’ for Gorsuch to Be Criticizing Trump’s Tweets
text:
Laura Ingraham: ‘Concerning’ for Gorsuch to Be Criticizing Trump’s Tweets by Josh Feldman | 6:41 pm, February 8th, 2017 
Conservative radio host and LifeZette editor-in-chief Laura Ingraham , who tweeted mere days ago that Neil Gorsuch should be “confirmed fast,” took issue with President Trump ‘s Supreme Court nominee going at odds with the president. 
Earlier today Gorsuch told a Democratic senator that he finds Trump’s tweets slamming a judge “disheartening,” giving some indication of his independence on the court. 
But Ingraham found Gorsuch’s remarks troubling: Indep Jurist or Runaway Judge? "Gorsuch says Trump's tweets abt judiciary are 'demoralizing' and 'disheartening'" https://t.co/Fylw3rMtuW 
— Laura Ingraham (@IngrahamAngle) February 8, 2017 Is this a terrible sign that Gorsuch desires to fit in with the elites—or a sign that he really is that clever? https://t.co/2GXOPvBeGo 
— Laura Ingraham (@IngrahamAngle) February 8, 2017 Judge Gorsuch's comments abt @realdonaldTrump 's tweets are concerning. Judges Pryor or Hardiman know better. Doesn't bode well 
— Laura Ingraham (@IngrahamAngle) February 8, 2017 Wrong. Most would refrain from commenting on the guy who just nominated him, regardless of merits. But perhaps the @nytimes will be happy https://t.co/xZbMgrMwNa 
— Laura Ingraham (@IngrahamAngle) February 8, 2017 
[ image via screengrab ]
